mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod_detail(prod_idx, sell_id, prod_name, prod_info, prod_cate, prod_price, prod_sell, prod_sell_deadline) VALUES(prod_idx_seq, #{sellerId}, #{name}, #{info}, #{cate}, #{sell}, #{deadline})
mapper.update: UPDATE prod_detail SET prod_name = #{name}, prod_info = #{info}, prod_cate = #{cate}, prod_price = #{price}, prod_sell = #{sell}, prod_sell_deadline = #{deadline} WHERE prod_idx = #{id}
